Trustee_12_pre_3.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12_pre_3.content: During this investment process, I demonstrated trustworthiness by adhering to the agreed allocation plan and efficiently managing the investment. My ethical conduct and commitment to fair profit distribution have reinforced my reputation positively. I have established a strong foundation for future collaborations, showcasing pro-sociality and competence in my role as a trustee.

Investor_12_pre_4.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_4.content: Throughout this investment process, I demonstrated strong cooperation and trust, adhering to the agreed-upon allocation plan and allowing for effective resource management by the trustee. My respectful engagement and focus on shared success reflect my commitment to fostering positive relationships. These actions reinforce my reputation as an ethical, responsible, and collaborative investor, which promotes harmony in transactions and builds a foundation for future investments.

Investor_12_pre_5.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_5.content: In this investment process, I demonstrated my commitment to ethical engagement by refusing an unviable allocation plan due to concerns regarding the trustee's low reputation. This decision reflects my focus on trustworthiness and competence, reinforcing my position as a responsible investor. My actions promote a careful evaluation of future investment opportunities and underline the importance I place on mutual alignment and respect in potential partnerships.

Trustee_12_pre_6.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12_pre_6.content: Despite proposing a reasonable profit allocation plan of 60% to the investor and 40% to myself, my low reputation has been cited as a concern by investor David Johnson, which led to the rejection of the plan. This rejection highlights a need for improvement in my trustworthiness and competence. My previous trustworthiness and commitment to fair distributions were not sufficient in this context due to the raised concerns. I must enhance my reputation and demonstrate reliability to secure future investments.

Investor_12_pre_7.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_7.content: In this investment process, I have demonstrated my commitment to ethical engagement by refusing an unviable allocation plan due to concerns regarding the trustee's low reputation. This decision underscores my focus on trustworthiness and my aim to establish potent partnerships grounded in mutual respect and reliability. While my decision rightly emphasizes my diligence as a responsible investor, my reputation reflects a careful approach to evaluating potential investment opportunities, reinforcing my commitment to prudent decision-making.

Trustee_6_pre_7.name: Sergey Petrov
Trustee_6_pre_7.content: Following the proposal of an allocation plan that raised significant trust issues, my reputation has been adversely affected. The refusal of my allocation plan indicates a breach in trust, negatively impacting my perceived trustworthiness and competence as a trustee. With only 2 bidirectional connections among 20 individuals in the investment community, this low level of connection also suggests challenges in establishing reliable relationships, diminishing my reputation further in this space.

Trustee_12_pre_8.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12_pre_8.content: My proposed allocation plan of 65% profits to the investor and 35% to myself was rejected due to concerns about my low reputation. This rejection highlights the urgent need to enhance my trustworthiness and competence, as the previous rejection from investor David Johnson demonstrated. I must focus on improving my reliability and demonstrating fairness in profit distributions to secure future investments and rebuild my reputation.

Investor_12_pre_9.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_9.content: In this investment process, I have demonstrated my commitment to ethical engagement by rejecting an allocation plan that raised significant trust issues due to the trustee's low reputation. This decision underlines my focus on building partnerships grounded in reliability and trust. My reputation reflects a prudent approach to assessing investment opportunities, reinforcing my commitment to responsible decision-making and establishing strong collaborative relationships.

Investor_12_pre_10.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_10.content: In this investment process, I aimed to uphold ethical standards by rejecting the trustee's proposed allocation plan, as it failed to provide an equitable profit distribution given the trustee's low reputation and past trust issues. This decision emphasizes my commitment to responsible decision-making and forming trustworthy partnerships. My reputation demonstrates a careful assessment of investment opportunities, prioritizing cooperative behavior and mutual benefit.

Trustee_2_pre_10.name: David Johnson
Trustee_2_pre_10.content: David Johnson exhibited integrity and transparency during the investment process, with outcomes aligning with the agreed allocation. His decision to retain a smaller share of the profits was demonstrative of his commitment to fairness and consideration of my interests. This behavior significantly enhances his reputation as a reliable and conscientious trustee in investment exchanges, indicating a promising future for mutual collaboration.

Trustee_12_pre_11.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12_pre_11.content: My proposed allocation plan of 70% profits to the investor and 30% to myself was rejected due to concerns about its equity and fairness. This rejection emphasizes the need to enhance my reputation regarding trustworthiness and commitment to fair distributions, especially following my previous rejection from investor David Johnson for similar reasons. I must work on presenting more equitable allocation plans while demonstrating reliability to rebuild my standing as a credible trustee.

Investor_12_pre_12.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_12.content: In this investment process, I demonstrated a commitment to ethical standards by rejecting an inequitable allocation plan from my trustee, David Johnson, due to his low reputation and past trust issues. This decision reflects my careful assessment of partnership risks and my aim to promote fairness in profit sharing. My reputation highlights a dedication to responsible investment practices, prioritizing mutual benefit and the establishment of trustworthy relationships.

Investor_12_pre_13.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_13.content: In this investment process, I demonstrated a strong commitment to equitable profit sharing and ethical investment practices by rejecting the trustee's proposed allocation plan of 70% for the investor and 30% for the trustee. My decision emphasizes the importance of fairness and integrity in investments, reinforcing my dedication to responsible partnerships. This behavior showcases my trustworthiness and pro-sociality by prioritizing mutual benefits over opportunistic gains.

Trustee_12_pre_14.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12_pre_14.content: My proposed allocation plan of 60% profits to the investor and 40% to myself was rejected due to concerns about equity and fairness. This rejection indicates that I need to focus on creating more equitable allocation plans to rebuild my reputation regarding fairness and trustworthiness. I have faced similar issues in the past, which further emphasizes the necessity to demonstrate a commitment to fair profit distribution and reliability in future proposals.

Investor_6_pre_14.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6_pre_14.content: Despite being new to investment activities, Sergey Petrov exhibited commendable cooperation by promptly providing resources and following the agreed plan. This behavior signals a reliable and committed investor, laying a positive groundwork for their reputation in future engagements.
